definition: thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: These antennas are commonly used at earth-based stations in satellite communications systems.
sentences.chinese: 這種螺旋天線常用於無形通訊系統中的地面臺站。

sentences.english: The cuting-to-Vary direction radiation pattern illustrates tha…
sentences.chinese: 用多切割面輻射方向圖描述該天線的全向性。

sentences.english: The coded signal is received by satellite dish aerials.
sentences.chinese: 編碼信號由碟形衛星天線接收。

sentences.english: Electromagnetic noises of H-field antenna dominated the receiving depth and receiving quality.
sentences.chinese: 拖曳天線的本地噪聲決定了其接收深度及接收性能。

sentences.english: Principles and methods are described briefly for measuring earth station antenna gain by using 3dB and 10dB beam widths.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了用衛星源法測量衛星通信地球站天線的特點。

sentences.english: When covered by your hand, this antenna suffers from attenuation.
sentences.chinese: 當你用手覆蓋了這個點，天線信號就會衰減。

sentences.english: The method has been applied in mechanical scanning antenna servo system.
sentences.chinese: 該方法在機械掃描天線伺服系統中得到了一定的應用。

sentences.english: In this paper, a car-borne antenna stabilized tracking system is studied.
sentences.chinese: 本文對車載天線穩定系統進行了較深入的研究。

sentences.english: Multi-Probe Technique is an important revolution to the antenna near-field test technique.
sentences.chinese: 該技術是天線近場測量技術的一次重大革新。

sentences.english: The small electrical antenna is characteristic of a low input impedance and a low efficiency.
sentences.chinese: 傳統的電小天線其特點是低輸入電阻和低效率。

sentences.english: An EMP can seriously damage electronic devices connected to power sources or antennas.
sentences.chinese: EMP會嚴重損壞連接到電源的電子設備或天線。

sentences.english: The narrow bandwidth property of a microstrip antenna is one of the important reasons to restrict its wide application.
sentences.chinese: 微帶天線的窄頻特性是限制它廣泛應用的原因之一。

sentences.english: It is the core of smart antenna processing.
sentences.chinese: 自適應算法是智能天線陣列處理的核心。

sentences.english: The Type 037-I can be distinguished by its bulky radome positioned on the bridge roof ahead of the tripod mast.
sentences.chinese: 型以它位於艦橋頂部三腳桅杆上的龐大天線罩爲特點。

sentences.english: The original installation receiving antenna, strengthens the signal receptivity .
sentences.chinese: 原裝接收天線，加強信號接收能力。

sentences.english: In accordance with simulation results, the characteristics parameters of photoconductive antenna were calculated.
sentences.chinese: 並結合模擬結果對光電導天線的特性參數進行了計算。

definition: tablet computer (iPad, Android devices etc)/CL:臺|台[tai2]
